CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps: Behaviors
CurrentVersion.description: A new data type in Microsoft 365 Defender Advanced Hunting. Behaviors will optimize the alerts queue by enabling security teams to focus on the most relevant alerts in their environment. They will indicate what took place in a descriptive form, attached to the MITRE tactics and techniques that are common measure most organizations follow and test their coverage against. This new data type which sits between the raw data and alert, will enable your security teams to prioritize critical alerts in your environment without having to compromise contextual information provided in a behavior that may be important to an investigation. The behaviors data will also enrich the context of related incidents and only correlate anomalies when relevant. Within Defender for Cloud Apps, we have identified some detections that are better suited as behaviors, and we are transforming them to the new data type to reflect it that can be retrieved via advanced hunting.

Behaviors will optimize the alerts queue by enabling security teams to focus on the most relevant alerts in their environment. They will indicate what took place in a descriptive form, attached to the MITRE tactics and techniques that are common measure most organizations follow and test their coverage against. This new data type which sits between the raw data and alert, will enable your security teams to prioritize critical alerts in your environment without having to compromise contextual information provided in a behavior that may be important to an investigation. The behaviors data will also enrich the context of related incidents and only correlate anomalies when relevant. Within Defender for Cloud Apps, we have identified some detections that are better suited as behaviors, and we are transforming them to the new data type to reflect it that can be retrieved via advanced hunting.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
CurrentVersion.description: Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Add premium capabilities to Planner
OldVersion.description: Add premium capabilities like sprint planning, people view, goals, custom fields, and task history to your plans within the Planner Teams app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: ‘Add emoji’ updated keyboard shortcut
CurrentVersion.description: Insert emojis directly from your keyboard without any distractions. Use colons (e.g. :smile:) in the compose box to add any emoji, even your custom ones, making it quicker to express yourself.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: ‘Add emoji’ updated keyboard shortcut
OldVersion.description: Insert emojis directly from your keyboard without any distractions. Use colons (e.g. :smile:) in the compose box to add any emoji, even your custom ones, making it quicker to express yourself.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Event Recap in Town hall and webinar (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for town hall and webinar event instances, just like the intelligent recap experience you are used to in meetings. Event organizer, co-organizers and presenters can now easily explore the meeting recording by speakers and topics, and access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. In addition to availability with a Teams Premium license, intelligent event recap features are also available in Copilot for Microsoft 365 licenses.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Event Recap in Town hall and webinar (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for town hall and webinar event instances, just like the intelligent recap experience you are used to in meetings. Event organizer, co-organizers and presenters can now easily explore the meeting recording by speakers and topics, and access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions. In addition to availability with a Teams Premium license, intelligent event recap features are also available in Copilot for Microsoft 365 licenses.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Save filters for Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: Ability to save the filters applied to Activity Explorer and use them later.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Save filters for Activity Explorer
OldVersion.description: Ability to save the filters applied to Activity Explorer and use them later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
CurrentVersion.description: This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Trigger Power automate workflows as outcome of DLP rule match
OldVersion.description: This introduces a new DLP rule action to trigger custom Power automate workflows when a DLP rule is violated.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
CurrentVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Remove recommendations in Recommended to You
OldVersion.description: This gives users the ability to remove the recommendations which they do not need in the Recommended to you section.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Flexible Layouts
CurrentVersion.description: New flexible layout sections allow authors to build pages without the strict column structure. Web parts can be dynamically resized and moved within the flexible section.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Flexible Layouts
OldVersion.description: New flexible layout sections allow authors to build pages without the strict column structure. Web parts can be dynamically resized and moved within the flexible section.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot marks high priority mails in your inbox and provides a short summary of the mail's importance in the message list and the reading pane. Mails can be sorted and filtered by Copilot's priority. In Web and New Outlook for Windows, you can also choose to have Copilot mark low priority mails. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot
OldVersion.description: Prioritize my inbox by Copilot marks high priority mails in your inbox and provides a short summary of the mail's importance in the message list and the reading pane. Mails can be sorted and filtered by Copilot's priority. In Web and New Outlook for Windows, you can also choose to have Copilot mark low priority mails. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Editorial Card web part in SharePoint Pages and News
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a Web Part called the Editorial Card to enhance page experiences. This card-like container allows for manual creation tailored to your needs, creating eye-catching content to capture viewers’ attentions.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Editorial Card web part in SharePoint Pages and News
OldVersion.description: We are introducing a Web Part called the Editorial Card to enhance page experiences. This card-like container allows for manual creation tailored to your needs, creating eye-catching content to capture viewers’ attentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for leaders in Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Empower leaders to ask questions about their organization and how their team is doing through responses that leverage Viva Insights behavioral metrics and organizational context data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot for leaders in Viva Insights
OldVersion.description: Empower leaders to ask questions about their organization and how their team is doing through responses that leverage Viva Insights behavioral metrics and organizational context data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices update only when idle
CurrentVersion.description: Updates from Teams admin center for Teams devices will happen only when they are idle. This will minimise end-user disruption.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams devices update only when idle
OldVersion.description: Updates from Teams admin center for Teams devices will happen only when they are idle. This will minimise end-user disruption.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence (Microsoft managed storage)
OldVersion.description: With this capability, Admins can choose to store a copy of the file that resulted in a DLP policy match. The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity. To configure Microsoft managed storage, similar to customer managed storage, the user can go to endpoint DLP settings and select Microsoft managed storage. As compared to customer managed storage, the admin need not configure any additional settings like adding a blob, assigning permissions, or selecting storage in policy workflow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Entra compromised user signals in IRM
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, IRM analysts can identify if the user being investigated has any compromise user alerts in Microsoft Entra. This will help them formulate the right response action, like escalating the Incident to SOC teams for quick remediation, etc. Microsoft Entra offers two types of compromised user detections: 1. Sign in risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific sign-in. 2. User risk detections - Compromise risk associated with a specific user. - Insider risk management admins can opt into each of the above risk detections from Insider risk management global settings. - Risk detections will be available in the indicator timeline within the alert investigation experience. - Risk detections will not impact the risk score or severity of Insider risk management alerts. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/id-protection/concept-identity-protection-risks

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Microsoft 365 Groups for Managing New Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a new Loop workspace, users can specify an existing Teams enabled Microsoft 365 Group to manage the workspace's lifetime, governance, and compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Microsoft 365 Groups for Managing New Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: When creating a new Loop workspace, users can specify an existing Teams enabled Microsoft 365 Group to manage the workspace's lifetime, governance, and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Data Loss Prevention to restrict Microsoft 365 Copilot processing on content with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention is extended to Microsoft 365 Copilot. This feature will allow DLP policies to provide detection of sensitivity labels in enterprise grounding data and restrict access of the content in Microsoft 365 Copilot.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Data Loss Prevention to restrict Microsoft 365 Copilot processing on content with sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention is extended to Microsoft 365 Copilot. This feature will allow DLP policies to provide detection of sensitivity labels in enterprise grounding data and restrict access of the content in Microsoft 365 Copilot.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - MIP auto-labeling for Azure SQL & Storage
CurrentVersion.description: Extend your sensitivity labels to specific or all subscriptions within Azure Storage and Azure SQL Server via auto-labeling policy. Clearly define labeling conditions for data sources beyond M365 without fear of it interfering with existing M365 files configurations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - MIP auto-labeling for Azure SQL & Storage
OldVersion.description: Extend your sensitivity labels to specific or all subscriptions within Azure Storage and Azure SQL Server via auto-labeling policy. Clearly define labeling conditions for data sources beyond M365 without fear of it interfering with existing M365 files configurations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections insights and recommendations digest
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a periodic digest email to editors of Viva Connections, informing them of the analytics summary of their Connections experience and recommendations to improve engagement.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections insights and recommendations digest
OldVersion.description: This creates a periodic digest email to editors of Viva Connections, informing them of the analytics summary of their Connections experience and recommendations to improve engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Keyword monitoring email notification enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: This revamps the existing content alert (keyword monitoring) emails that admins receive to include added context on the content being monitored and minor security enhancements.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Keyword monitoring email notification enhancements
OldVersion.description: This revamps the existing content alert (keyword monitoring) emails that admins receive to include added context on the content being monitored and minor security enhancements.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
OldVersion.description: SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: CVI support for Townhall and Webinar presenters
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can now join Teams Townhall and Teams Webinar sessions using third-party video teleconferencing devices (VTC) through Cloud Video Interop (CVI) coordinates provided in presenter invites.  Only trusted CVI devices can join the event and use presenter features like Green Room.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Add CVI Coordinates to Townhall and webinar invites
OldVersion.description: With CVI coordinates in invites, now non-Teams users—such as external customers or partners—can easily join Teams Townhall and webinar meetings using a third-party teleconferencing device.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Presenter joins Townhalls via dial-in
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Townhall presenters will now have the ability to join their townhalls using dial-in details. These details will be available in the body of the invite email they receive from Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Townhall Attendee/Presenter email dial in details.
OldVersion.description: With the release of this feature, the Townhall attendee and presenter invites will have dial in details available in the body of the email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Create channels with ease
CurrentVersion.description: Efficiently create channels directly from the header menu, eliminating the need to scroll down to the specific team. As a channel creator, you will have the flexibility to choose from all the teams you can create a channel in to host your new channel.
